result.title: How can I get better at understanding the mathematical notations on Codeforces editorials?
result.content: I often get lost when reading Codeforces editorials due to complex mathematical vocabulary and notation, or sometimes even proofs and theorems that seem to be obvious for the editorial writer but not for me. Would anyone mind to share their experiences with this themselves in their own beginnings or at least some resource to lay the base for my understanding? Would be much appreciated!
